author: Simon Difford
description: Cachaça based and bittersweet with orange accents and Fernet Branca contributing subtle bitterness.
name: Bitter in Brazil
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably large chunk of block ice)
